name: Duolingo Blur Background
description:
You must install https://userstyles.org/styles/124013/duolingo-dark-translucence (deArt)
Please use it with https://openuserjs.org/scripts/sourplum/Duolingo_Enhancement_Suite and https://userstyles.org/styles/126867/duolingo-enhancement-suite
Hope you enjoy!
additional_info: Custom background supported at installation of the theme.
